name: Sierra Stray
text: This establishment is under all new owners and management. They're pizzas are lovely and fresh and delicious. Myself and my daughter were very pleased with this place for dinner after a long day at Palmetto Island. Definitely go try them out!

name: Michael Herrera
text: This store is under new ownership and new management. Customers are treated as family. Give them a shot. You won’t be disappointed.

name: Kasa
text: Ordered a small pizza for delivery, gave a tip, waited two hours, tracker said it was on the way, I drove to the store, they had it, went home, ate an overpriced cold pizza. Needs either more employees or faster employees.

name: Abigale Gros
text: Terrible. Don’t order. Took longer than an hour & they brought me the wrong soda . It was only a 2 item order ... 1) why’s it take so long & 2) how do you get it wrong . Never ordering from this papa johns again

name: Keith Stansbury
text: Sorry you see you guys closed the Abbeville location.

name: Charles Kilgore
text: I reccomend that no one try their luck with this store. The last three times I have ordered from this location my pizza has been well over an hour in being delivered. I believe in giving a business a fair chance but tonight was the final …More

name: Todd Nikki
text:
*** Last time we order from the Abbeville store***
We placed our order online and were given a 30-40 minute estimated delivery time. Called the store after 60 minutes passed and we were told the order was on the …More

name: Paul Ouzenne
text:
Food was hot and Delicious, Very nice delivery person,  Food was delivered with in 15 minutes supper fast compared to the other pizza company's.
Thank You Paul Ouzenne

name: Jesse Rich
text: Good food. Have been mischarged before though.

name: Benjamin Russell
text: Still waiting for pizza to be delivered,  after waiting almost an hour.  Not looking good to get a tip.

name: demiurge ainz
text: Good pizza them mfs just take forever
